name: Onion Rings
author: Janet Welter

ingredients.name: Vegetable oil or shortening for frying

instructions: Peel onion; cut into 1?2 inch slices. Separate into ring. Place in a large bowl and cover with water. Refrigerate for 30 minutes, drain on paper towels. Combine flour and salt. Add egg, milk, and 1 tablespoon of oil, beating until smooth. Dip rings into this batter and fry in hot oil or shortening (375) until golden on both sides. Drain on paper towels.
